title: Why are my users being charged VAT for in-app purchases on Google Play?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I've implemented an in-app purchase store in my game with Unity, but in some countries the price that I've defined is different from what users are being charged.

sections.title: Cause
content: This can be an issue with the app store's VAT settings, meaning the store is adding tax to the price that you determined and is thus causing it to be higher than your game states.

sections.title: Resolution
content: You will need to let the store know that your price includes VAT - see Google Play's documentation on tax rates and VAT for more information.
